alert.note: Alert for Beartooth Foothills; Livingston Area; Northern Sweet Grass; Paradise Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 2:56PM MST until January 07 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Additional snow will be less than an inch tonight. However, winds will increase to 40 to 50 mph by Friday morning, causing areas of blowing snow with reduced visibilities. * WHERE...Portions of south central Montana. * WHEN...Until noon MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Snow chances will wind down tonight into Friday. Watch for slick roads. Blowing snow will become a concern as winds increase tonight into Friday morning. Localized visibilities less than a mile are possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1. Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at http://www.weather.gov/billings

area.areaDesc: Beartooth Foothills; Livingston Area; Northern Sweet Grass; Paradise Valley
